properties.name: weatherApi.apiKey
properties.description: The API key to be used for API requests.

properties.name: weatherApi.apiUrl
properties.description: The API url to be targetted by requests.

properties.name: weatherApi.apiPeriodMs
properties.description: The time between requests in ms, to account for ratelimits.

properties.name: weatherApi.cities
properties.description: A comma-separated list of cities in format 'City@CountryCode' to initiate the app with.

properties.name: weatherApi.enabled
properties.description: Whether bean should start its collection thread.
